set-variable.doc:name: query expected records
set-variable.value: #["SELECT count(*) total from Vcrm_RegionAgencyTribe WHERE StartTime > :validFrom" ]

set-variable.doc:name: query expected records with custom watermark
set-variable.value: #['SELECT count(*) total from Vcrm_RegionAgencyTribe WHERE StartTime between :start and :end' ]

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: #[ %dw 2.0 output application/json skipNullOn="everywhere" --- " SELECT " ++ " RTRIM(CustomerAccountNumber_Key) as CustomerAccountNumber_Key, " ++ " RTRIM(Agency_Code) as Agency_Code, " ++ " RTRIM(AgencyName) as AgencyName, " ++ " RTRIM(Region_Code) as Region_Code, " ++ " RTRIM(RegionName) as RegionName, " ++ " RTRIM(Tribe_Code) as Tribe_Code, " ++ " RTRIM(TribeName) as TribeName, " ++ " FORMAT(StartTime, 'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fffZ') AS ValidFrom " ++ " FROM Vcrm_RegionAgencyTribe " ++ " WHERE CustomerAccountNumber_Key IN('012J000542','012J000628','012J000656','012J000691','012J000702','012J000718','012J000741','012J000786')"++ " ORDER BY StartTime " ++ " OFFSET " ++ (vars.offset as String) ++ " ROWS " ++ " FETCH NEXT " ++ (vars.maxRecords as String) ++ " ROWS ONLY" ]

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- payload map (item, value) ->{ account: item.CustomerAccountNumber_Key as String, agencyCode: item.Agency_Code, agencyDescription: item.AgencyName, regionCode: item.Region_Code, regionDescription: item.RegionName, tribeCode: item.Tribe_Code, tribeDescription: item.TribeName, date: item.ValidFrom }
